payload.content: Markets are currently revaluing software due to AI, as investors are concerned about the potential replacement of existing SaaS business models.

name: Markets are currently revaluing software due to AI, as investors are concerned a
content: Markets are currently revaluing software due to AI, as investors are concerned about the potential replacement of existing SaaS business models.

payload.content: Significant selloffs in the market following the releases of Claude CoWork and Gemini have initiated discussions regarding seat-based pricing, inference costs, and enterprise adoption timelines for AI-driven software.

name: Significant selloffs in the market following the releases of Claude CoWork and G
content: Significant selloffs in the market following the releases of Claude CoWork and Gemini have initiated discussions regarding seat-based pricing, inference costs, and enterprise adoption timelines for AI-driven software.

payload.content: Analysts are divided on whether entrenched enterprise systems and distribution advantages will protect incumbent software companies from AI disruption, or if agent-enabled products will primarily disrupt weaker vendors and pricing models.

name: Analysts are divided on whether entrenched enterprise systems and distribution a
content: Analysts are divided on whether entrenched enterprise systems and distribution advantages will protect incumbent software companies from AI disruption, or if agent-enabled products will primarily disrupt weaker vendors and pricing models.
